attributes.action: STOP the increase in the price of fuel, and reduce it to a maximum of £0.90 per litre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to reduce the outrageous cost of fuel before it gets any higher. As i write this, local fuel stations are selling it at £1.02 per litre. 4 weeks ago it was £0.98 per litre. a rise of 4p per litre in less than month. At this rate, it will be £1.10 per litre by christmas! This much be stopped now! I propose that the price of fuel should be dropped, and frozen, at a maximum of £0.90 per litre.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
